alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:12AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Horry County through 1015 AM EDT... At 911 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coastal Carolina University, or over Red Hill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River Entrance, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Adrian, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Bucksport, Wampee, Goretown, Bucksville and Hand. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 9 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
